website_summaries.verdict: Featuring 2 legends of the Galar region, this comprehensive box is the ultimate set of Pokémon cards for new trading card game players.
pros: Includes 65 card sleeves, 8 booster packs, player’s guide, 45 energy cards, dice, coin, markers, and everything needed to play
Zamazenta and Zacian themed boxes available
cons: It would be nice if buyers had the opportunity to select between Zamazenta and Zacian

customer_reviews.title: Factory sealed, great condition and value
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to get this item on time and also to see that Pokemon is finally using a wrap with a Pokeball design to help prevent people from resealing packs without others noticing. Out of my box I got 3 pokemon v including one full art. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Box/packs came re-sealed
customer_reviews.text: The box came re-sealed (see pictures) -- shrink wrap did not have the poke ball pattern, actual packs have heat seal marks where the print has come off and glue strings. I'm exchanging for another box, we'll see if the second one has the same issue. I've gotten cards on Amazon before and been fine, just check your product carefully! EDIT: Just adding some more info/evidence -- one of the packs' cards were not in factory order (the rare and reverse at the back), and another pack had a white/green code card with a standard rare (should be holo or better)
customer_reviews.author: C. Eason

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubby for Valentines and it did not disappoint. He got a nice spread and one of the top valued cards he could possibly get. Hes very excited!
customer_reviews.author: Alacia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Buy from MVP Marketplace
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to buy online again but recently have been selecting myself which seller to buy from for each product. MVP Marketplace is great. I got 2 golds out of 3 trainer boxes. Pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Greyjack

customer_reviews.title: Okay Pulls
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I bought one of these and it came as shield dog box, ordered a second time and it came as sword dog box. So that's pretty cool. However the first box came in pokeball official wrap, and the second box came in clear wrap which is a little weird/fishy, but the box had some decent pulls so i guess it's a non-issue. Shipped fast, arrived fast. Probably will buy more to feed my life-long addiction to opening children's playing cards.
customer_reviews.author: Will Yum

customer_reviews.title: I'm a happy camper!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three trainer boxes. They all came factory sealed and on time. Had great pulls to add to my master set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Pulls
customer_reviews.text: We bought 1 trainer box from a local game store and got great cards. The one we received from Amazon didn't even have a full art or V/VMAX card in it. Our box was a dud. I know its luck of the draw but we literally got the worst cards in our box. My husband and son were bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Wanted one of each variant.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, thinking I would get one of each variant... I guess that’s what I get for assuming.
customer_reviews.author: iTruth

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Its nice but I got nothing good at all. No Vs, Vmaxs, full arts or gold cards. Also got an unusual amount of repeats and I ordered the blue. Not red. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Shunk

customer_reviews.title: Fake Garbage
customer_reviews.text: But at your local shop, this stuff is either fake or tampered. Missing cards, Any card that had the rare code cards had the super rares inserted upside down. Flimsy code cards that felt fake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Re-packaged!!! Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this again . Not sure if I will buy any pokemon cards. This box was re packaged. Inside my box was damaged. So upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun as always!
customer_reviews.text: I am biased. I like Pokemon and their products. There is nothing like opening a box like this one, checking out the dice, the new sleeves, and opening a few booster packets! Always fun to keep the box and stash the cards in there. I was lucky enough to get my first gold card! Luck of the draw!
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I know GX attacks aren't big in this set but not including an acrylic GX counter with the poison and burn counters was a bit cheap. Also the sleeves are definitely cheap and will bust at the sides eventually, but $35 or $40 bucks for eight packs of cards alone is worth it. Then you add everything else and it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged Materials
customer_reviews.text: When my son opened this box, most of the packages had already been opened. There were cards included that were not part of the elite trainer booklet, the booklet was on the outside. A lot of "red flags" after he opened it. There were no "fancy" cards in this box, so I imagine someone took all of them out and repackaged this. Very disappointed and my son now has a lesson is dishonesty of companies:(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Flory

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and had lots of fun opening these cards. Great pulls and great price. Will definately buy again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: BOX TAMPERED WITH DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product was tampered with, it came without the official pokemon logo seal wrap because it was opened and the packs were all made to the worst pulls. I have bought 5 of these from local sellers and none were not in the official wrap. Unfortunately, I didn't realize this was a possibility before opening, or I would have returned. This is disgusting and should be illegal!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my 9 year olds birthday gift. He thought it was “so cool” so I’m extremely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon Pokémon TCG: Sword & Shield Elite Trainer Box
customer_reviews.text: Was to be a gift........most contents missing....card packs open........regular cards left....
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Packs all opened and no rare and reverse holo cards.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't the blue version. The substituted red one had all the packs opened already, and all the reverse holo, rare cards, and potentially holo cards were taken out. All I got was the leftover junk. No way this is the value I paid. At least 50% off it should be. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The book says that this expansion set INCLUDES 17 new Pokémon V and 4 new Pokémon VMAX. There were ZERO V and VMAX cards in the box. The box did not appear to have been tampered with. Needless to say my 8 year old grandson is disappointed. I suspect we will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Misleading listing
customer_reviews.text: This listing should be revised or clarified. It is not for the blue Zamazenta box. It is for either that box OR the red Zacian box. Ordered this and the Zacian box through the "Frequently Bought Together" system and received 2 Zacian boxes. Very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Unlucky
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing i only got one v card and one holo card the rest of the packs were bad I knew it's all about luck but i was expecting at least 3 good cards Fun fact i redeemed the codes in the pokemon tcg online game and got one secret rare and 3 v card This box is worth the money if you got something good but you don't really know what you will get until you buy one so it's hard to recommend Well atleast the box is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No V
customer_reviews.text: I got no V/ VMax and the only good card was a rare trainer. Mine came factory sealed but I did not get the best pulls sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Q

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous I might have gotten a dud because the shrink wrap did not have the pokeball marks, but apparently this is only true of the first printing. Second printing features a clear wrap. I checked my box and everything was in order. Got really good pulls and a V/Vmax.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Happy kid!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for my 11 year! He was thrilled with how much was in this!! Great deal
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon Pokémon TCG: Sword & Shield Elite Trainer Box is nice addition for collectors.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was absolutely delighted when he received these in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen T Trandem

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was very misleading, was expecting 2 packages due to the pricing and the fact that both shield and sword were displayed in the images. Package was more than likely tampered with. I wouldn’t recommend anyone to buy this item. It was nice to receive the energy cards. Only positive about this entire purchase. Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.author: PokeHomework

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely real. Came in original Pokémon package. First time buying one for someone and they loved what came in it. So I mean 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy, Tampered Product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in poor condition, the box was obviously resealed very poorly. Booklet was missing from inside, all packs had been opened and resealed. The card codes were in the wrong way for the packs with a guaranteed foil card, they left one non valuable V card to try and save face. Do not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Box arrived in non-factory wrap
customer_reviews.text: Box did not come with factory seal. Every box I've seen from factory has had the pokeball seal on the plastic wrap to prove it was not tampered with. This has me worried the box packs inside have been weighed.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Baum

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got nothing good and my dice came open. The packs where probably weighed. DO NOT BUY FROM HERE GO TO THE POKÉMON WEBSITE OR TARGET BEST BUY OR GAME STOP. This was a scam.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Not factory sealed but cards looked good, I’m unlucky
customer_reviews.text: Box did not come factory sealed but the packs seemed to be untampered with. I got one secret rare pull but the rest were regular rates. Must have been my luck. The listing does not specify or allow you to choose which color box you receive. I assumed I would get blue since that’s the cover image, but I ended up getting a red.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the box and not only were all of the packs opened but there were a bunch of code cards inside - who knows if they were used or not? Completely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hormann

customer_reviews.title: Pull rates suck wrong box too
customer_reviews.text: It shows that the box and booklet are blue and I ended up with the red that I already had so sad and also the pull rates suck
customer_reviews.author: semaj

customer_reviews.title: Tampered with.
customer_reviews.text: Came tampered with, but i needed the box more than anything. The only reason its not a 1 star is whomever tampered with it was nice (or stupid) enough to leave a V card in it. Not a valuable one, but a V card none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good pulls, came in clean and perfect condition. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Doan

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: The boxes keep lookin nicer as the sets go on. Got some good pulls but obviously it’s just luck.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Would've liked to get one of each
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one sword and one shield, but got both sword boxes
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Richards

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when it was on sale and was worried it was gonna be tampered with, but it wasn’t. I got amazing pulls! Very worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Basak

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: worst box I ever had... Not a single V or Vmax...
customer_reviews.author: Waham

customer_reviews.title: Not resealed
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews that these boxes where resealed. Got mine and package didn’t seem open. My packs came with good pulls got a snorlax full art and one other v card.
customer_reviews.author: Catarino Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cool Looking!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. A good value for money and very nice looking. It did get a but damaged but only the outer sleeve that you throw out anyway. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jayden

customer_reviews.title: wasn't in the factory seal but
customer_reviews.text: wasn't in the factory seal but I still manage to pull 3 v cards, overall a good experience but I think my money could have been spent on a better product
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good just gotta read the title closely
customer_reviews.text: Thought I ordered a zam one but I look back through the order and realized I messed up. Got v snorlax and lapras tho so I’m not complaining
customer_reviews.author: jarod

customer_reviews.title: Find a different listing for this product
customer_reviews.text: Some straight bs all the packs came opened with all the cards of value already taken out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Casillas

customer_reviews.title: It is REsealed
customer_reviews.text: It did not come in the pokeball wrapping it was all banged up, I do not recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as it should be
customer_reviews.text: Everything was there and nothing was tampered with. Still in factory seal and in mint condition. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin

product_meta.title: Pokemon Pokémon TCG: Sword & Shield Elite Trainer Box
product_meta.description: Start a new journey & meet new Pokémon V! Welcome to the Gala region! Meet more than a dozen powerful new Pokémon V, including the legendary zacian and zamazenta—and some, like stonjourner and Snorlax, that can evolve into enormous Pokémon VMAX for even more power! You'll also find first partners grookey, scorbunny, and gobble, little cuties like wooloo and camper, and a handful of familiar Pokémon in their new galarian forms. Catch up with a new generation in the Pokémon TCG: sword & shield expansion.
feature_bullets: The Pokémon TCG: sword & shield Elite trainer box includes 8 Pokémon TCG: sword & shield booster packs.
This also comes with 65 card sleeves featuring zacian or Magenta and 45 Pokémon TCG energy cards.
You will also receive 6 Damage counter dice, 1 Competition legal coin-flip die, and 2 acrylic condition markers.
Show your Pokemon pride with a special collector's box to hold everything, including 4 dividers to keep it organized.
You will also find a player guide to the sword & shield expansion to help you in your training and a code card for the Pokémon trading card game online.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars472 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
